roleset.name: to cause to diminish, diminished
roleset.note: IMPAIR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'impair' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from impair.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: The department would be required to block the buy-out if the acquisition is likely to financially weaken a carrier so that safety-27 would be impaired [*-27]; its ability to compete would be sharply diminished; it would be put into foreign control; or if the transaction would result in the sale of airline-related assets -- unless selling such assets had an overriding public benefit.
